io.fluo.core.impl

Class TransactorNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fluo.core.impl.TransactorNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class TransactorNode
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    A transactor node is marker in Zookeeper that helps clients determine if a transactor has died and its transactions can be rolled back.
